mapper.insert: INSERT INTO adoption (user_id, pet_name, pet_type, pet_breed, pet_age, pet_gender, description, images, contact, location, status, create_time, update_time) VALUES (#{user_id}, #{pet_name}, #{pet_type}, #{pet_breed}, #{pet_age}, #{pet_gender}, #{description}, #{images}, #{contact}, #{location}, #{status}, #{create_time}, #{update_time})
mapper.select: SELECT a.*, acc.username, acc.avatar, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM adoption_application WHERE adoption_id = a.id) as application_count FROM adoption a LEFT JOIN account acc ON a.user_id = acc.id WHERE a.id = #{id}

SELECT a.*, acc.username, acc.avatar, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM adoption_application WHERE adoption_id = a.id) as application_count FROM adoption a LEFT JOIN account acc ON a.user_id = acc.id WHERE a.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY a.create_time DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.update: UPDATE adoption SET status = #{status}, update_time = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}

UPDATE adoption SET pet_name = #{pet_name}, pet_type = #{pet_type}, pet_breed = #{pet_breed}, pet_age = #{pet_age}, pet_gender = #{pet_gender}, description = #{description}, images = #{images}, contact = #{contact}, location = #{location}, update_time = #{update_time} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT a.id, a.user_id, a.pet_name, a.pet_type, a.pet_breed, a.pet_age, a.pet_gender, a.status, a.create_time, acc.username, acc.avatar FROM adoption a LEFT JOIN account acc ON a.user_id = acc.id WHERE a.status = #{status} ORDER BY a.create_time DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{limit}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM adoption WHERE status = #{status}
SELECT pet_type AS name, COUNT(*) AS value FROM adoption WHERE status = 1 GROUP BY pet_type
